entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
